entry.title: Compressed Bitcoin Transactions
entry.summary: The email starts with the sender, Fabian, thanking the recipient, Tom, for his efforts in research and implementation. Fabian suggests considering using an index from a sorted UTXO (Unspent Transaction Output) set instead, which could potentially save space and make the scheme compatible with pruning. Fabian mentions that this was on his list as a future research topic but he hasn't had the chance to explore it yet.
